Class SecurityConfig

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.security.SecurityConfig
@Configuration @EnableWebSecurity @EnableMethodSecurity public class SecurityConfig extends Object
Configuration class for security settings.

    • tokenCookieAuthenticationStrategy

      @Bean TokenCookieAuthenticationStrategy tokenCookieAuthenticationStrategy(@Value("${COOKIE_TOKEN_KEY}") String cookieTokenKey) throws ParseException, com.nimbusds.jose.JOSEException
      Bean definition for creating TokenCookieAuthenticationStrategy.
      Parameters:
      cookieTokenKey - the key used for encryption and decryption of tokens
      Returns:
      the configured TokenCookieAuthenticationStrategy
      Throws:
      ParseException - if there is an error parsing the cookie token key
      com.nimbusds.jose.JOSEException - if there is an error in the JOSE (Javascript Object Signing and Encryption) process
      See Also:
      • TokenCookieService
      • DirectEncrypter
      • DirectDecrypter
      • OctetSequenceKey

    • filterChain

      @Bean org.springframework.security.web.SecurityFilterChain filterChain(org.springframework.security.config.annotation.web.builders.HttpSecurity http, TokenCookieAuthenticationStrategy tokenCookieAuthenticationStrategy, TokenCookieAuthenticationConfigurer tokenCookieAuthenticationConfigurer) throws Exception
      Security filter chain definition.
      Parameters:
      http - the HttpSecurity object to configure
      tokenCookieAuthenticationStrategy - the configured TokenCookieAuthenticationStrategy
      tokenCookieAuthenticationConfigurer - the configured TokenCookieAuthenticationConfigurer
      Returns:
      the configured SecurityFilterChain
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an error during the configuration process

      • TokenCookieAuthenticationStrategy

      Parameters:
